name: Pothole Runner
description:
The road is littered with potholes as you attempt your daring escape from the po-po for your heinous crime. Losing tires will slow you down, and sometimes you will have to fight your car from veering off the road, but thankfully there are  a couple spare tires you can pick up along the way.  Keep your speed up, put some distance between you and the police, and escape!

This is the first game I've ever made, learned a lot from this jam and I hope to learn even more from your feedback.
